snippet.title: Penrose Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Penrose is a non-linear narrative adventure game about time, choice, and the nature of obsession. Players navigate forward and backward through a generation-spanning story, making subtle changes that nudge events towards their inevitable conclusion. Featuring seven original compositions for violin by VANCORVID.

Play Penrose now!

Web: https://penrose.doublespeakgames.com
iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/id1516904436
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.doublespeakgames.penrose

http://www.doublespeakgames.com

Trailer by Magill Foote
http://magillfoote.com/

Trailer Soundtrack by Vince Nitro
https://vincenitro.bandcamp.com/
